Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: This product was exactly what,it was said to be. Not disappointed. Condition on phone was near mint and I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Was a very Good Buy
Reviews.Author: CPC
Reviews.Content: The product was exactly what we wanted, exactly as the specs said, in Excellent condition.  Would recommend buying to anyone looking for a good deal on an iphone !

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4 newest model
Reviews.Author: alconcerto "Joe Shakespeare"
Reviews.Content: Product InformationNow you can see your loved ones while talking to them over the iPhone 4(Verizon) smartphone that features FaceTime option. This Apple iPhone gives you the utmost screen resolution with its Retina display for razor-sharp and vibrant images. This Apple smartphone has the ability to run third-party apps simultaneously devoid of affecting performance or battery. Featuring 5MP camera with an integrated LED flash, backside illumination sensor, and front-facing camera, this Apple iPhone lets you capture beautiful and detailed images even in low light conditions. With the Voice Control feature of the iPhone 4(Verizon) smartphone, you can make calls by just naming the concerned person. Moreover, this Apple smartphone takes you to your desired destination with the correct directions, thanks to its integrated GPS feature.Product Features  FaceTime  People have been dreaming about video calling for decades. iPhone 4 makes it a reality. With just a tap, you can wave hello to your kids, share a smile from across the globe, or watch your best friend laugh at your stories - iPhone 4 to iPhone 4 over Wi-Fi. And it works right out of the box. No other phone makes staying in touch this much fun.  Two cameras, two views  iPhone 4 has two cameras: One on the front, which focuses on you. And one on the back, which focuses on everything else. FaceTime lets you switch back and forth between them at any time during a video call. All you have to do is tap a button.  Retina display  The retina display on iPhone 4 is the sharpest, most vibrant, highest-resolution phone screen ever, with four times the pixel count of previous iPhone models. In fact, the pixel density is so high that the human eye is unable to distinguish individual pixels.  Multitasking  iPhone 4 introduces a whole new way of multitasking. Now you can run your favorite third-party apps - and switch between them instantly - without slowing down the performance of the foreground app or draining the battery unnecessarily.  HD video recording and editing  Shoot your own movies in high definition. Capture impressive video even in low-light settings, thanks to the advanced backside illumination sensor and built-in LED light. Then edit and create your own mini-masterpiece right on iPhone 4 using the iMovie app - with Apple-designed themes, titles, and transitions.  5-megapixel camera with LED flash  Take beautiful, detailed photos with the 5-megapixel camera with built-in LED flash. The advanced backside illumination sensor captures great pictures even in low light. And the front-facing camera makes it easy to take self-portraits.Product IdentifiersBrand AppleMPN  IPHONE432GBWHTCDMACarrier VerizonFamily Line Apple iPhoneModel 4UPC 885909420469Type SmartphoneKey FeaturesCapacity 32GBColor WhiteNetwork Technology CDMABand CDMA 800/1900Camera 5.0 MPOperating System iOSBatteryBattery Type Lithium IonBattery Capacity 1420 mAhBattery Talk Time 840 minBattery Standby Time 300 hrDisplayDisplay Technology LCD displayDiagonal Screen Size 3.5 in.Display Resolution 960 x 640 pixelsOther FeaturesTouch Screen YesBluetooth YesDigital Camera YesGPS YesEmail Access YesInternet Browser YesSpeakerphone YesDimensionsHeight 4.5 in.Depth 0.37 in.Width 2.31 in.Weight 4.8 ozPortions of this page Copyright 1997 - 2011 CNET Channel. All rights reserved.

Reviews.Title: Great  Deal
Reviews.Author: Lafire
Reviews.Content: Until  This  Day,Still  Like  New  &  Working. I  Am  Happy  With  What  I  purchase . Great  Deal  Unmatched  Price  Deal!

Reviews.Title: We had a slight issue and amazed at how it was handled
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: We had a slight issue with the phone and I was amazed at how the problem was taken care of. I felt this was worth 5 stars because it's so important on how a company handles problems along with the quality of their products !!! Shop here - you won't regret it !!!

Reviews.Title: I needed more storage & I got it for a great price!
Reviews.Author: M. C. Jilly
Reviews.Content: This is the second iPhone I have owned that I purchased NEW from vendors other than Apple, & the third I have actually owned!I found that I needed more storage & I got it for a great price!  I could not find anything comparable price-wise in an iPhone 5, but the iPhone 4 does everything I need it to do!I like having the control of bringing my own phone to cell phone service providers & not getting tied into a contract!  When you arrive at a provider with a good phone, no one gives you any hassles!Set-up is easy & Apple support is still available online no matter who you bought it from!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE NO SIM CARD AND DON'T THINK ITS BRAND NEW
Reviews.Author: Cherie H.
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a smart phone forever so my husband got me this one for my birthday he said he read the reviews and there was never anything mentioned about it not coming with a sim card so I want to warn you ahead of time it doesn't come with one also my phone was already set up and I had to delete everything and install new software but now that it doesn't have a sim card I can't complete the sets of setting it upUPDATE: SO I HAVE OWNED MY PHONE FOR ABOUT 2 WEEKS NOW AND HAVE YET GOTTEN TO USE IT THE FIRST TIME I USE IT, IT FREEZES UP AND GETS A GREEN SCREEN WITH LINES MOVING THROUGH IT SO I CONTACT APPLE SUPPORT WELL MY WARRANTY WAS EXPIRED WELL THANK GOD I SAVED MY PROOF OF PURCHASE BECAUSE THEY WERE ABLE TO GIVE ME A 1 YEAR WARRANTY OTHER WISE I WOULD HAVE BEEN SCREWED WITHOUT THAT PROOF OF PURCHASE ANY WAY APPLE SUPPORT WALKS ME THROUGH RESTORING MY DEVICE LIKE I SAID ABOVE I NEEDED TO DELETE EVERYTHING AND INSTALL NEW SOFTWARE WELL SINCE I DIDN'T HAVE A SIM CARD I COULDN'T ACTIVATE IT SO I ORDERED ONE GOT IT TODAY WELL I TURN ON MY PHONE AND GUESS WHAT I HAVE ONLY A BLUE SCREEN NOW SO I CONTACT APPLE SUPPORT AGAIN SO THEY HAVE ME RESET IT WELL WHEN IT COMES BACK ON I ONLY HAVE A GRAY SCREEN SO THEY HAVE ME GO TO RESTORE IT AGAIN WELL AS IT IS RESTORING IT FREEZES UP AND THE GREEN SCREEN POPS BACK UP WITH LINES RUNNING THROUGH IT AND APPLE IS UNABLE TO GET IT TO FIX WE WENT THROUGH EVERY STEP SO NOW I HAVE TO WAIT ON APPLE TO SEND ME A BOX SO I CAN SEND MY PHONE TO THEM AND HAVE THEM FIX IT OR REPLACE IT SO JUST A HEAD'S UP TO EVERYONE HERE I DON'T THINK MY PHONE WAS BRAND NEW LIKE IT SAID CAUSE APPLE COULDN'T FIGURE OUT HOW IT WAS ALREADY ACTIVATED AND THINGS WERE ALREADY INSTALLED I SHOULD HAVE HAD TO ACTIVATE IT FROM DAY ONE AND IT SHOULD HAVE ALREADY HAD THE PROPER SOFTWARE BUT INSTEAD HAD A HARDWARE MALFUNCTION AND NOW I HAVE TO WAIT ANOTHER MONTH TILL I CAN EVEN USE MY PHONE SO ANY BUYERS BEWARE!!!!!!!! SO YOU DON'T HAVE TO GO THROUGH THE SAME HASSLE I DID

Reviews.Title: Good phone, good condition
Reviews.Author: Donna Hartzell
Reviews.Content: The phone came looking brand new with just a few scraps to the edges which are covered under a case. There is a problem with the charger however, doesn't seem to fit correctly but with other apple products in the house, it's not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4 32gb
Reviews.Author: Steven Montana
Reviews.Content: This phone turned out to be pretty good I should've payed $35.00 less than I did . Other than that the phone is terrific

Reviews.Title: Not convinced
Reviews.Author: J. Slusher
Reviews.Content: There's something fishy about the Iphone I received.The DC adapter, USB cord, and headphones are not Apple products. The DC adapter brick says "Designed by LIXIN" instead of Designed by Apple. Red flag.The phone itself is very lackluster. The OS is much slower to react than the Iphone 4 it replaced. The touchscreen becomes unresponsive very often, and you must lock and unlock the phone several times to complete a single sentence text message. If you are using an app that has any advertisements, when the ad changes the phone will freeze. The touchscreen in general is not as accurate as my previous Iphone 4.I know for a fact the accessories in the box are counterfeit. I have an appointment with the Apple store, and I'm almost expecting them to tell me the device is counterfeit. If not, then Apple's QC standards have slipped.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: carly
Reviews.Content: I am very interezado on the phone but would like to know if it works for any operator in the world.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Hender01
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for business use and it is just what I needed. I needed a phone with a good camera and the camera is wonderful on this phone.
